commit.message:
loop.c (maybe_eliminate_biv): For libcalls that set a giv, skip to end of libcall.

	* loop.c (maybe_eliminate_biv): For libcalls that set a giv, skip to
	end of libcall.

From-SVN: r26056

files.patch:

+	* loop.c (maybe_eliminate_biv): For libcalls that set a giv, skip to
+	end of libcall.
